Problem:
WeatherSystem Python Class",

If you manually increase the wind speed to 20 km/h, will the humidity level increase?
Explanation: Increasing the wind speed directly triggers the apply_wind_effect method which increases humidity by 5 when the wind speed is above 10 km/h.
